*Drazom, Mantella and Stingtra come out of the CR Chambers feeling as good =
as new* Stingtra: This is boring. There has to be something to do. Mantella=
: I don't want to stay in here. Drazom: Why? Mantella: Because somewhere in=
 this very base Quickstrike is being slagged. *Mantella says sadly as she g=
ets up and runs out of the base* *Stingtra follows her* *Now Drazom was rea=
lly getting worried. He gets up and follows Stingtra and Mantella*
